### Person

- name
  - Type: Identifier
  - Description: The name of the person.
- age
  - Type: integer
  - Description: The age of the person.
- hobbies
  - Type: Hobby[]
  - Description: The hobbies of the person.
  - Term: LIKES

### Hobby

- name
  - Type: string
  - Description: The name of the hobby.
